abstract.p: Serena Williams defeats Lindsay Davenport to win Estyle.com Classic tennis tournament (S)

block.p: Serena Williams rallied to defeat Lindsay Davenport for the fifth time in a row yesterday in the Estyle.com Classic in Manhattan Beach, Calif. It was Williams's first hardcourt tuneup for the defense of her United States Open title.
Williams, who turns 19 next month, defeated Davenport, her Olympic teammate, 4-6, 6-4, 7-6 (1). Following her victory in this tournament last August, Williams went on to win the United States Open.

Serena Williams rallied to defeat Lindsay Davenport for the fifth time in a row yesterday in the Estyle.com Classic in Manhattan Beach, Calif. It was Williams's first hardcourt tuneup for the defense of her United States Open title.
Williams, who turns 19 next month, defeated Davenport, her Olympic teammate, 4-6, 6-4, 7-6 (1). Following her victory in this tournament last August, Williams went on to win the United States Open.

Davenport, ranked second in the world, served for the match at 6-5 in the third set, but Williams broke at love to force a tie breaker. It was 1-1 when Davenport double-faulted, and Williams then won the next five points, ending the 2-hour-28-minute match by winning 11 of the final 12 points.
